Options.OPTION[Anarchy.Anarchy.AnarchyMo: Always enable Anarchy with Bulldoze Tool
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Anarchy.Anarc: With this option enabled the Bulldoze Tool will always have anarchy enabled.
With this option enabled the Chirper will be on fire when Anarchy is active for appropriate tools. Image Credit: Bad Peanut.
With this option enabled a tooltip with Ⓐ will be shown when Anarchy is active for appropriate tools.
With this option enabled an icon row with a single button for Anarchy will show up when using appropriate tools.
Upon confirmation this will reset the settings for Anarchy mod.
This will routinely trigger a graphical refresh to props placed with Anarchy that have been culled to prevent accidental culling of props. This affects performance.
If props placed with Anarchy have been accidently culled, you can press this button to bring them back now. This doesn't negatively effect performance.
This allows you to place multiple copies of unique buildings using the normal UI menu with or without Anarchy enabled. The effects of these buildings stack!
YY_ANARCHY_DESCRIPTION.AnarchyButton: Disables error checks for tools and does not display errors. When applicable, you can place vegetation and props (with DevUI 'Add Object' menu) overlapping or inside the boundaries of other objects and close together.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Anarchy.Anarc: With the net tool and Anarchy enabled you can violate the clearance of other networks. Zoning under low bridges can spawn buildings while doing this. This setting gives you some control over the minimum space below a low bridge. It would be better to just remove the zoning.
